contents: 2. fol. 75a-80b: [Jawāb suʾāl warada min baʻḍ al-ikhwān min ahl Hamadān].
3. fol. 80b-84a: Risālah fī al-jamʻ bayna al-aḥādīth.
5. fol. 85a-123a: Sharḥ Risālah fī ʻilm Allāh.
9. fol. 167b-168b: Fāʾidah fī bayān al-wujūdāt al-thalāthah.
13. fol. 185b-187a: [Jawāb suʾāl al-Sayyid Abī al-Ḥusayn al-Jīlānī].
16. fol. 200a-205b: [Jawāb masāʾil al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Jabbār].
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
